security_audit.summary: Legitimate WordPress white-labeling automation tool. Contains external command execution and network operations for legitimate WordPress configuration purposes. Filesystem access is limited to WordPress operations. No malicious patterns detected.

medium_findings.title: External URL download without validation
medium_findings.description: The script downloads logos from external URLs using download_url() without proper validation. While this is for legitimate branding purposes, it could be exploited if an attacker controls the config file to download malicious files.

medium_findings.title: Docker container command execution
medium_findings.description: The bash script executes docker commands that could be dangerous if container names are not properly sanitized. Uses docker exec with user-supplied container names.

low_findings.title: WordPress configuration modification
low_findings.description: Script modifies WordPress options and settings programmatically. This is the intended functionality but requires careful validation of input data.

content.value_statement: Manually configuring WordPress white-labeling plugins takes hours and is error-prone. This skill automates the entire process using free plugins, creating professional branded experiences in minutes.
actual_capabilities: Automates configuration of ASE, Branda, and White Label CMS plugins
Uploads and configures custom logos for login and admin areas
Sets custom login URLs for security (e.g., /client-login)
Configures dashboard widgets, admin menus, and user permissions
Applies brand colors to login page and admin interface
Hides WordPress branding and replaces with client branding
limitations: Requires WordPress with WP-CLI access or Docker container
Only works with free plugins (ASE, Branda, White Label CMS)
Logo must be accessible via URL for download
Cannot modify plugin code or add premium features

use_cases.title: Client Site Handoff Preparation
use_cases.description: Quickly brand WordPress sites before handing off to clients with professional login pages and clean admin interfaces.

use_cases.title: Bulk WordPress Branding
use_cases.description: Apply consistent branding across multiple client sites using JSON configuration files and automation scripts.

use_cases.title: Professional WordPress Setup
use_cases.description: Create polished, white-labeled WordPress experiences that hide default WordPress branding and reinforce your agency brand.

best_practices: Test the configuration on a staging site before applying to production
Keep a backup of original WordPress settings before running automation
Use descriptive login URLs that clients can remember easily
anti_patterns: Do not use common login URLs like /login or /admin for security
Avoid uploading oversized logos that slow down the login page
Never hide essential admin menus that clients need for content management

faq.question: Which plugins does this skill configure?
faq.answer: It configures ASE (Admin Site Enhancements), Branda (White Labeling), White Label CMS, and optionally Admin Menu Editor - all free WordPress plugins.

faq.question: Can I use this with existing WordPress sites?
faq.answer: Yes, it works with any WordPress site that has WP-CLI access or is running in a Docker container with the required plugins installed.

faq.question: What if I don't have a logo URL?
faq.answer: You can skip the logo configuration or upload it to WordPress media library first, then use the attachment ID in the config.

faq.question: Is it safe to change the login URL?
faq.answer: Yes, the skill uses ASE plugin to safely change login URLs while maintaining WordPress functionality. Just inform clients of the new URL.

faq.question: Can I undo the white-labeling changes?
faq.answer: The skill modifies WordPress options which can be reverted manually or by deactivating the configured plugins.

faq.question: Does this work with WordPress multisite?
faq.answer: The current implementation works best with single WordPress installations. Multisite may require additional configuration per site.
